input.sentences: mom and dad just got a fresh house .
and man is it nice and spacious .
weve never had such a huge kitchen .
and the living room could hold huge tvs .
output.sentences: John bought his mom a new house.
The inside of the house was beautiful.
The kitchen had plenty of room.
The living room had more then enough space for all her furniture.
John's mom loved the new house and was very grateful.
